# Breadcrumb

## Example

```
<bcgov-breadcrumb>
    <a href="#home">Home</a>
    <a href="#Components">Components</a>
    <a href="#DesignSystem">Design System</a>
    <span>Bread Crumbs</span>
</bcgov-breadcrumb>
```

## Component
<bcgov-breadcrumb>
    <a href="#home">Home</a>
    <a href="#Components">Components</a>
    <a href="#DesignSystem">Design System</a>
    <span>Bread Crumbs</span>
</bcgov-breadcrumb>
